markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs=""
>
[Eye of the Wise](/Equipment.aspx?ID=508)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 72</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This fist-sized, 12-rayed black star sapphire is sacred to [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=111), the elven goddess of magic and jewels, and most accounts of its creation attribute its crafting to a circle of her worshippers. In addition to the abilities listed below, the gem functions as a portal key for Jewelgate at Alseta's Ring.

<document level="2" id="action-311" />

<document level="2" id="action-312" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Eye of the Wise
